person.persName: John William McGarvey (Fayette Co, KY, minister, professor, & curator of Kentucky Univ)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, minister, professor and curator. Hopkinsville, Kentucky, native. Son of John McGarvey and Sallie Ann Thompson McGarvey. Married to Mary Otwayanna Frances Hix McGarvey in Fayette, Missouri, on March 23, 1853. Father of Loulie McGarvey, J. W. McGarvey, Jr., Ellen “Nellie” McGarvey, Thompson McGarvey, and Sarah McGarvey. Graduated from Bethany College in 1850. Taught at a male school in Fayette, Missouri from 1850 to 1851. Ordained in the Christian ministry in 1851. Minister in Missouri from 1851 to 1862. Professor of theology at The College of the Bible, Kentucky University. Member of the board of curators of Kentucky University.
